data.text: He knew the possible consequences to his actions and he knew he had a problem. He never sought out help and no one stepped in to help him. So if everyone wants to blame Ariana they also need to blame everyone else in his life for not seeing how bad he needed help

For example in his song God Speed (from 2015 before he even dated Ariana) “But white lines be numbing them dark times them pills that I’m popping, I need to man up admit it’s a problem, I need a wake up before one morning I don’t wake up”

If any of you actually listened to his music and listened to his lyrics you would know he’s been crying out for help for years. He mentions in almost every song about sound drugs and drinking and driving intoxicated and contemplating his death
